::Aerotaur::
    "I agree, Trinity go find a place inside the ship to rest."  He looks to 
Windlord, Perplex, and Gramps.  "We should start fortifying and repairing 
this ship.  He may come back with reinforcements and we should be ready.  
Don't worry about Nightlight I'm sure Land Mine will be able to take care of 
her until Zeni gets out of the CR chamber."
